verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are so good, Lord.
For Your mercies
Are new every morning.
I can awake and kneel to pray,
Casting all my cares on You.
You sustain me with unfailing faithfulness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are so good, Lord.
For Your judgements,
Reach unto heaven,
Your word is daily my delight,
And a light unto my path.
You sustain me with unfailing faithfulness.
